column5: NBRV armyrat So what the letter means over a month later and they still arent prepared to even request a crl meeting yet That is pretty sad new pudfa date wont be untill october at the soonest
NBRV looks like we are looking at 75 days minimum before any decision is made by the FDA for the go ahead to start production and approval until then load up on the dips

NBRV Hi everyone I emailed investor relations yesterday about their upcoming type a meeting with the FDA Here is their response Great response I think Hi John Ted presented at the BAML conference on 515 and gave an update We are working with our manufacturing partner to develop a briefing book that will need to be submitted to the FDA when we request the Type A meeting and looking to submit those items in the upcoming weeks Upon that submission the FDA has 30 days to grant the meeting and 30 days after that to provide the official minutes Thanks Dave David Garrett I VP Corporate Controller Head of IR P 6108166657 I davidgarrettnabrivacom

CPRX actually my thesis is that what is viewed as bad news for the economy in general such as trade wars effect certain stocks less Those would be what might be viewed as potentially undervalued stocks and value stocks including certain biotechs that are at critical junctions where their revenues are likely to explode soon and disruptors like LC Money that is fleeing directly affected stocks everything from Apple to Ford has only the options of lower yield investments or value stocks as well as certain biotechs I believe likes of CPRX and NBRV are just such companies Hang in there and we will be rewarded soon
